The only recovery is to exit eclipse and restart it before the tree works
again.
What CVS server version are you using?

Eclipse support server versions 1.11.1p1 or beyond. If you didn't leave of the 
tailing "1p1" then you should upgrade your server.

As for the assert, we should no be asserting on information from the server. 
We should have a look at this in the 3.0 stream.
